description:
This Reginlaze is a commander type, assigned to Arianrhod like Julieta`s machine, and used exclusively by Iok. At the suggestion of his mechanics and subordinates, its armament is mainly designed for long-range firing, and it is customized as a support type.
Source: en.gundam.info
name: EB-08s Reginlaze (Iok Ki)
